synopsis.text:
York Shin auction presents Gon and Killua with an opportunity to enter the enigmatic Greed Island, a game designed exclusively for Hunters. Following their confrontation with the spiders and the Ryodan, the duo embarks on a new journey within this immersive game world. With their Nen abilities put to the test, Gon and Killua must train and grow stronger to navigate the treacherous landscape filled with monsters and player killers.

Aiding them on their quest is Biscuit, the former teacher of Wing. With her expertise, they work on honing their secret abilities and uncovering the hidden intricacies of the game. As they delve deeper into Greed Island, Gon and Killua's ultimate goal remains unchanged: to unravel the mystery surrounding Ging Freecss and the uncanny realism of this hunter game. Prepare for a thrilling adventure as our young protagonists face new challenges and push their skills to the limit in this captivating continuation of their story.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
